message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find something similar elsewhere within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to compromise. I can sell the product to you for $110. It's a great price, considering the unique features and quality of the product.
